English: I will see you next Monday.
Spanish: Te veo la próxima próxima semana.

English: It's important to get enough rest.
The month of December is cold.
Spanish: El mes de diciembre es frío.

English: During winter, I like to ski.
Spanish: Durante el invierno, me gusta esquiar.

English: What are your plans for the weekend?
Spanish: ¿Cuáles son tus planes para el fin de semana?
